testcase.name: Add New Customer
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"..............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"......passed And Click on login..........................................................passed Then User can view Dashboard................................................passed When User click on customers Menu...........................................passed And Click on customers Menu Item............................................passed And Click on Add new button.................................................passed Then User can view add new customers page...................................passed When User enters customers info.............................................passed And Click on Save button....................................................passed Then User can view confirmation message "The new customer has been added successfully.".passed And close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.name: Successful Login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"..............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"......passed And Click on login..........................................................passed Then Page Title should be "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration"..........passed When User click on logout link..............................................passed Then Page Title should be "Your store. Login"...............................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
